name: jason-claude-plugins
description: Personal Claude Code plugin marketplace for Jason Y

plugins.name: jason-handoff
plugins.description: Session handoff skills and hooks for seamless context transfer between Claude Code sessions

plugins.name: jason-design-system
plugins.description: Design-system-first skill — discover existing tokens and components before writing UI code

plugins.name: jason-memory
plugins.description: Local project memory with auto-dedup, versioning, and BM25 search. Zero dependencies. Stores decisions, patterns, and learnings in .memory/ committed to git.

plugins.name: jason-context-researcher
plugins.description: Context researcher agent — searches project docs in its own context window, returns focused summaries. Protects the main conversation from doc-reading bloat.
